Header.title: Crew Coin
Header.paragraph: A new way to motivate your team.

About.paragraph: After managing thousands of employees, I realized that all employees had one thing in common. They respond best to immediate gratification. Your employees will work harder to achieve their goals, when they know they will be immediately rewarded. Crew Coin is a digital employee incentive program that puts you back in control. You control the currency. You control the store. Crew Coin is the digital solution you've been looking for.

Testimonials.text: It's like Bitcoin for the employer! Easy to use. Great concept!
Testimonials.name: Joe Huntley

Testimonials.text: This is a game changer. My employees stay motivated!
Testimonials.name: Chris Belgium

Testimonials.text: I love this app! Crew Coin really drives engagement and has helped greatly with my retention problem.
Testimonials.name: Jake Swicklo

Testimonials.text: I literally can add anything to the crew coin store. My employees love using this app!
Testimonials.name: Victoria Weaver

Testimonials.text: Very easy to setup. I feel like I'm back in control. After covid, we had some tough times but Crew Coin helped us get back on track.
Testimonials.name: Rob Bieber

Testimonials.text: As an employee, I love being rewarded for my work. Crew Coin keeps me motivated
Testimonials.name: Bittany Morton

Features.title: HTML5
Features.text: Add items to your store that you know your employees will love.

Features.title: CSS3
Features.text: Tell your employees what they can do to earn Crew Coins to spend in your store.

Features.title: React
Features.text: Send Crew Coins to your employees to re-enforce good performance.

Features.title: NodeJS
Features.text: Effective motivation for your team. Happy Employees. Happy You.

Features.title: MongoDB
